data.name: Dratini
data.flavorText: It is called the "Mirage Pokémon" because so few have seen it. Its shed skin has been found.

data.name: Dratini
data.flavorText: It is called the "Mirage Pokémon" because so few have seen it. Its shed skin has been found.

data.name: Dragonair
data.flavorText: If its body takes on an aura, the weather changes instantly. It is said to live in seas and lakes.

data.name: Dragonair
data.flavorText: If its body takes on an aura, the weather changes instantly. It is said to live in seas and lakes.

data.name: Dragonite
data.flavorText: It is said to make its home somewhere in the sea. It guides crews of shipwrecks to shore.

data.name: Bagon
data.flavorText: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

data.name: Shelgon
data.flavorText: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.

data.name: Salamence
data.flavorText: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.

data.name: Latias
data.flavorText: Its body is covered in a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.

data.name: Latios
data.flavorText: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.

data.name: Rayquaza
data.flavorText: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.

data.name: Axew
data.flavorText: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

data.name: Axew
data.flavorText: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.

data.name: Fraxure
data.flavorText: Since a broken tusk will not grow back, they diligently sharpen their tusks on river rocks after they've been fighting.

data.name: Fraxure
data.flavorText: Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles between Fraxure can be intensely violent.

data.name: Haxorus
data.flavorText: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.

data.name: Druddigon
data.flavorText: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.

data.name: Kyurem
data.flavorText: It can produce ultracold air. Its body is frozen.
